eu.amidst.dynamic.inference

Interface InferenceAlgorithmForDBN

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicMAPInference, DynamicVMP, FactoredFrontierForDBN, HuginInferenceForDBN

    public interface InferenceAlgorithmForDBN
    This interface handles and defines the algorithm used to run inference in DynamicBayesianNetwork models. For examples eu.amidst.dynamic.examples.inference.

    • Method Summary

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        nTimesAhead - an int that represents the number of time steps ahead.
